MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​CoreLib.​TableModule_Globals
[MoonSharpModule]
public
MoonSharp.​Interpreter.​CoreLib.​TableModule_Globals

Class exposing table.unpack and table.pack in the global namespace (to work around the most common Lua 5.1 compatibility issue).
